details:

Composition:

precautions: The mandatory precautions for labetalol injection are described below.It is not advisable to use the labetalol injection if you are allergic to any ingredient.Do not use the injection if you have the following cardiac disorders: heart block, sick sinus syndrome, cardiogenic shock.If you have persistent low blood pressure, do not use the injection.Do not use labetalol if you have bradycardia, which is a slow heart rate.Do not use the injection if you have a lungs problem, adrenal gland tumor, Prinzmetal angina.Do not use the medication without a doctor’s recommendation if you are pregnant. At the same time, sudden disturbance of blood pressure needs to be treated with labetalol.Use only on doctor’s advice if you are breastfeeding. Notify your doctor if you use non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs, anti-depressants, general anesthetics, or other blood pressure-controlling medicines.Inform your doctor if you have any of the following conditions:Disturbed or reduced renal functioning.Disturbed hepatic functioning.Peripheral vascular disorder.Type 1 or type 2 diabetes.Recent severe anaphylactic condition.Hyperthyroidism or thyrotoxicosis.Metabolic acidosis.If you have scheduled surgery nearby.Tell your doctor/Pharmacist your medical history of, Heart failure, Slow heartbeat, Second- or third-degree atrioventricular block, Asthma, Chronic bronchitis, Emphysema, Kidney disease, Liver disease, Hyperthyroidism, Serious allergic reactions including those needing treatment with epinephrine, blood circulation problems, Depression, Myasthenia gravis, Cataracts, Glaucoma. This is safe in Pregnancy.
effects: The common and severe labetalol injection side effects are outlined below. Inform your doctor if you experience severe and prolonged side effects.Dizziness.Allergic reaction causing swelling, rash, or hives.Stomach upset.Numbness.Cardiac failure.Bronchospasm.Increased hepatic functioning tests.Dizziness and Tiredness may occur. Scalp tingling may also occur as your body adjusts to the medication. The decreased sexual ability has been reported rarely.

effects: Following are some of the side effects that may occur with the use of this medication. Some of the side-effects listed below are temporary, while some are life-threatening and may even cause death; if necessary, precautions are not taken on time. If any of the following side-effects persists or worsens, seek medical assistance immediately.HeadacheLethargy or FatigueIrritable Bowel Syndrome such as constipationDizziness or DrowsinessLight-headednessSwelling on tongue, face, hands, or feetIrregular heartbeatHigh potassium levels in the bloodSore throatRenal problems are one of the most pertinent issues that could occur because of these medications.These medications weaken the heart.Extreme Sweating
